abstract: The CIT Group filed for bankruptcy protection, a humbling event for the 101-year-old lender, but one expected to keep the company running.
snippet: The CIT Group filed for bankruptcy protection, a humbling event for the 101-year-old lender, but one expected to keep the company running.
lead_paragraph: Update | 3:46 p.m. Three months ago, the CIT Group barely averted what it considered to be a ruinous bankruptcy filing that would likely have put the 101-year-old lender out of business.

headline.main: CIT to Test Speed of Bankruptcy Court

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
